üë§ Bio

I am a PhD student in Computer Science at University of Virginia, advised by Prof. Aidong Zhang. Previously, I received my M.S. in Computer Science from Courant Institute of Mathematical Sciences, New York University and my B.S. in Mathematics from University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign, with minors in Computer Science and Electrical Engineering.

My research mainly falls into the general domains of machine learning, with a focus on improving the robustness and generalizability of machine learning models. Lately, I am interested in the LLM alignment and Agentic AI.

üì£üì£ I am looking for a research scientist/quantitative researcher intern in 2026 summer. Please reach out to me if there is a match!
